EmailTemplate.name: 16/04/2013 Foundation and Primary ASA's
EmailTemplate.subject: Foundation and Primary ASA's
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
British International School Kuala Lumpur Part of The British Schools Foundation
Dear {!Contact.Salutation} {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName},
Thank you for registering your child for ASA's this term. Wherever possible we have tried to enrol all children in either their first or second choice ASA. On both Tuesday and Thursday more than 90% of children have been enrolled in their first choice ASA. Here are the class lists:
Reception https://eu1.salesforce.com/sfc/p/D0000000DDpn/a/D00000004QTi/NCnp2VZ93Wd_Kir.JL9N6bSgnX1U8nXnasG0hP7O5BQ=
Year 1 https://eu1.salesforce.com/sfc/p/D0000000DDpn/a/D00000004QTn/r__YLNhdOION7EcrjhILoMIYW9cMhPJ20Pe_wnEga6Q=
Year 2 https://eu1.salesforce.com/sfc/p/D0000000DDpn/a/D00000004QTs/OhasFjK_mkFh5eJroSMmujAxp6O0nllfI47jNQ_HclM=
Year 3 https://eu1.salesforce.com/sfc/p/D0000000DDpn/a/D00000004QTx/BmfdrwP0GfrjtctI8BqS2hzyNgeulKtdXMFOv9QaltA=
Year 4 https://eu1.salesforce.com/sfc/p/D0000000DDpn/a/D00000004QU2/ANfIIDpUCNmrpSRSZK.FtvvnOk1tuqQRLVL3RhNWk3o=
Year 5 https://eu1.salesforce.com/sfc/p/D0000000DDpn/a/D00000004QU7/tt0F1xqNYr1CM01N81K9cXBNKnW2NcUxGltb1_cFe4I=
Please note the following:
Bible Study Class will not be commencing due to lack of numbers. We are awaiting confirmation as to whether Golf will take place on Wednesday and Friday. We will let you know as soon as possible.
If you have not yet registered your child for ASA's please do so following the link below:
REGISTRATION FORM ( https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1FM58roonjDfYC_e52pqTQ8CeSfVFGW-w-CptDRjbhqI/viewform )
If you are having any problems with ASA registration this term, I will be available in my classroom (4C) between 3:00 and 4:00 tomorrow (Wednesday 17th April) to help. Alternatively, e-mail sean.allday@britishschool.edu.my
Kind Regards
Sean Allday Year 4C Teacher
Administration Team The British International School of Kuala Lumpur World Class Education
__________________________________________________________ Beijing - Kuala Lumpur - Sao Paulo - Manila - Moscow - Guangzhou - Nanjing - Tashkent - Pamplona - Marbella
